question:
Which of the following parks/ sanctuaries is/are correctly matched with their location :
I : Ghana—Assam
II : Gir—Rajasthan
III : Manas—Assam
IV : Corbett—M.P.
V : Periyar—Kerala
VI : Dudwa—U.P.
explanation:
• Ghana—Rajasthan
• Gir—Gujarat
• Manas—Assam
• Corbett—Uttrakhand
• Periyar—Kerala
• Dudwa—U.P.
